sentences.sentence: Prevarication couched in pious homilies may no longer suffice.
sentences.translation: 表述在虔诚的布道中的支吾可能不再足够。

sentences.sentence: I used to find notes left in the collection basket, beautiful notes about my homilies.
sentences.translation: 过去，我常常在教堂的募捐篮里面发现一些优美的留言，有些涉及我的布道。

sentences.sentence: His message to politicians echoes the simple homilies his grandfather taught him. Do your job.
sentences.translation: 他给政客的咨文好似效仿他的外祖父当年给他的简单家训：干好你的活计！
